content.rendered:
TTE Products & Solutions was part of a customer event organized by the LU-VE group in Dubai recently. Representing TTE were Dilip Sharma (Executive Vice President), Abin Kurian (Senior Sales Manager), Praveen Meledath (Assistant Manager, Sales & Estimation) and Jerin Thomas (Sales Engineer). The customer event was organized to celebrate its achievements of 2023 with key customers, distributors and suppliers from UAE and Oman. TTE congratulates the LU-VE Group on a wonderful year and wishes it the very best for 2024. We look forward to working closely with you in the months to come.

A leader in the production of air heat exchangers, LU-VE Group has been designing and manufacturing its products based on cutting-edge technologies in the field of industrial & commercial refrigeration and industrial air conditioning.
